sen.j: 父・信繁と通称が同じ典厩のため、 父は古典厩、信豊は単に典厩または後典厩と呼ばれている。
sen.e: Nobutoyo's Tenkyu (Minister of Horses, Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) indicated in Chinese name) was as same as that of his father, Nobushige; Nobushige was called 'Ko-tenkyu (old Tenkyu) while Nobutoyo was called mere Tenkyu or Go-tenkyu (later tenkyu).
